roleset.name: sooth
roleset.note: SALVE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls butter-9.9. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from salve.01-v)

role.descr: salve, thing that makes the pain go away

example.name: the one example
example.text: On Saturday night, [quite a few of the boys in green and gold]-1 salted away successes [*-1]to salve the pain of past and, no doubt, future droughts.
example.arg: the pain of past and, no doubt, future droughts
